item.title: Why the heatmap is not showing the expected access patterns?
item.description: TL; DR: try --draw_range all option of damo report heatmap if it shows not what you expected. damo report heatmap outputs sometimes show no expected access pattern. It is sometimes just entirely black, or shows some access pattern but not what the user expected. This post is for explaining the reason and how you can work around. The problem usually happens when user tries to draw the heatmap for access pattern that recorded for a virtual address space of a process.
